Professional Experience

Plant Quality and EHS Manager

Mektec Manufacturing Corporation Europe HU Kft.

Primary responsibilities include Quality and EHS systems oversight the manufacturing site, standardization of Quality and EHS processes, competency evaluation and training of site employees, customer relationship building (OEM, TIER1), project management, corporate level support, tracking and trending of quality metrics, monitoring and handling of compliance with IATF 16949, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 and all applicable legal laws, requirements for safety and environmental.

Ensures quality assurance and control for company products and processes, report directly to the Plant Manager / Regional Director of Quality - Europe
